controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full name and authorisation evidence for each individual agent authorised to act on behalf of individual customers?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting agent names and authorisation evidence

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and to what extent to verify the identity of agents of individual customers?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for agent identity verification

controls.label: When determining the extent of identity verification for agents of individual customers, does your program have regard to the ML/TF risk relevant to the provision of the designated service?
controls.detail-label: Explain how you apply ML/TF risk assessment when determining verification extent

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full name and authorisation evidence for each individual agent authorised to act on behalf of non-individual customers?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting agent names and authorisation evidence

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and to what extent to verify the identity of agents of non-individual customers?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for agent identity verification

controls.label: When determining the extent of identity verification for agents of non-individual customers, does your program have regard to the ML/TF risk relevant to the provision of the designated service?
controls.detail-label: Explain how you apply ML/TF risk assessment when determining verification extent

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program provide for agents of non-natural customers to be identified by a customer-appointed verifying officer (as an alternative to direct agent verification)?
Does your program require agents identified by a verifying officer to be identified in accordance with your verifying officer procedures?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedures for agent identification by the verifying officer

controls.label: Does your program require verifying officers to be identified and verified by your reporting entity in accordance with Chapter 4 requirements?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you identify and verify verifying officers

controls.label: Does your program require evidence of the customer's authorisation of the verifying officer to be provided to your reporting entity?
controls.detail-label: Describe what authorisation evidence you require from the customer

controls.label: Does your program require the verifying officer to make a record of all matters collected and the customer to retain this record?
controls.detail-label: Describe the record-keeping requirements and retention procedures

controls.label: Does your program require the verifying officer to provide the agent's full name to your reporting entity?
Does your program require the verifying officer to provide a copy of the agent's signature to your reporting entity?
Does your verifying officer procedure require collection of the agent's full name?
Does your verifying officer procedure require collection of the agent's title or position held with the customer?
Does your verifying officer procedure require collection of a copy of the agent's signature?
Does your verifying officer procedure require collection of evidence of the agent's authorisation to act on behalf of the customer?

groups.title: Agents of Individual Customers
groups.description: Procedures for collecting and verifying information about individuals authorised to act on behalf of individual customers

groups.title: Agents of Non-Individual Customers
groups.description: Procedures for collecting and verifying information about individuals authorised to act on behalf of non-individual customers

groups.title: Verifying Officer Model (Non-Natural Customers)
groups.description: Alternative procedure allowing agents of non-natural customers to be identified by a customer-appointed verifying officer
